feed.title: Mandeville Lab
feed.subtitle: We study the evolutionary genetics and ecology of freshwater fishes, plus a few more things, at Northern Michigan University

entry.title: Test post
entry.content: One fish, two fish. Red fish, blue fish. Liz likes fish. Genes and computers are cool too.
